Production total: 3,694The U.S. made 950 M1917s (a near copy of the FT design), but only 64 were finished before the end of the war, and none saw combat.

Tank: A7V  There was, briefly, one A7V with two extra machine guns in place of the 57 mm cannon. It was later converted to use the 57mm cannon.
